data.name: .bowerrc
data.desc: Defines where bower should save its components under the bower_components file. This overrides bower’s default location for bower_components directory.

data.name: bower.json
data.desc: Defines the fron-end repositories needed to be installed through bower.  Do not edit this file directly. You can run “bower install package --save”.

data.name: dev-requirements.txt
data.desc: Requirements that are used in the development environment only. You need to install these on setup.

data.name: requirements.txt
data.desc: Production environment  requirements. You need to install these for production environment setup.
